articles.title: New IRS Impersonation Scam Targets Elderly with AI Voice Cloning
articles.description: Scammers are using AI to clone voices of IRS agents, targeting elderly taxpayers with threats of arrest. The FBI warns seniors to verify any IRS contact through official channels.

articles.title: Medicare Open Enrollment Scams Surge 40% This Season
articles.description: Federal Trade Commission reports dramatic increase in Medicare-related scams during open enrollment. Fraudsters pose as Medicare representatives to steal personal information.

articles.title: Grandparent Scam Evolution: Scammers Now Using Social Media Intel
articles.description: Law enforcement warns that scammers are harvesting family information from social media to make grandparent scams more convincing, including specific names and details.

articles.title: Tech Support Scams Target Seniors with Fake Virus Warnings
articles.description: Computer users over 65 are primary targets of tech support scams showing fake virus alerts.

articles.title: FTC Alert: Romance Scams Cost Seniors $139 Million in 2024
articles.description: Federal Trade Commission data shows romance scams disproportionately affect older adults.
